title: Comaverde
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Build-your-own salad, wrap, or pita with selections from an assortment of chopped veggies and fruits plus dressings. Has dessert cups with combinations of cooked fruit and spices. Located at Casa del Arcoiris (the rainbow house), 50 meters west of the Hospital Calderon Guardia visitors ramp on a side street. Replaced the previous Cambalache with change of ownership and food concept.
streetAddress: Ramp Calderon Guardia Hospital visits, 50 meters west
